Author: Scarlet_Flames2
Text: This happened to me, and both my cardiologist and dietician said it was a blood volume issue. They told me to drink a bottle of Gatorade a day in addition to more water, and it made the issue go away for me after three days.

Author: pestaname
Text: It absolutely could be your body. When you low restrict for a long time, your stomach muscles become weakened and don’t work properly. This is called Gastroparesis. I got it, a ton of us struggle with it. It is harder for your body to make the muscular contractions needed to move food through your system. I would suggest eating a few small meals throughout the day, nothing very fatty or strong in flavor, keep it simple and easy to digest.   That might be it and maybe your blood sugar levels go haywire when u eat? I’m not a doctor so idek, but keep the food that u do eat very simple
